REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0347 reute b f BC-FRENCH-FEBRUARY-INFLA 03-30 0077

TEXT.TITLE: FRENCH FEBRUARY INFLATION CONFIRMED AT 0.2 PCT
TEXT.BODY: French retail prices rose a confirmed 0.2 pct in February, in line with provisional figures released two weeks ago showing a rise of between 0.1 and 0.2 pct, the National Statistics Institute said. The rise compared with a 0.9 pct rise in January. Year-on-year retail price inflation was confirmed at 3.4 pct for February compared with a three pct rise year-on-year in January. REUTER
